patterns: Searching stats on apple quality control
I want help on AQL data
responses: The last batch of (noInBatch) apples contained (nbrBlotch) Blotched, (nbrNormal) Normal, (nbrRot) and (nbrScab) apples. In total (nbrRej) apples were rejected in this batch

The last batch of (noInBatch) apples contained (percBlotched)% Blotched, (percNormal%) Normal, (percRot)% Rot and (percScab)% Scabbed apples. In total (percRej)% of the apples were rejected in this batch

patterns: are there blotched apples in the batch?
is blotch detected in the batch of apples?
responses: Out of (noInBatch) apples (nbrBlotch) were blotched, this is (percBlotch)%
(percBlotch)% of the apples were rejected, this equals to (nbrBlotch) apples

patterns: are there acceptable apples in the batch?
responses: Out of (noInBatch) apples (nbrNormal) were Normal this is (percNormal)%
(percNormal)% of the apples were normal, this equals to (nbrNormal) apples

patterns: are there Rotted apples in the batch?
Is Rot detected in the batch of op apples?
responses: Out of (noInBatch) apples (nbrRot) were Rot, this is (percRot)%
(percRot)% of the apples were rejected, this equals to (nbrRot) apples

patterns: are there Scabbed apples in the batch?
is scab detected in the batch?
responses: Out of (noInBatch) apples (nbrScab) were Scabbed, this is (percScab)%
(percScab)% of the apples were rejected, this equals to (nbrScab) apples

patterns: are there defect apples in the batch?
what diseases are in the batch
responses: Out of (noInBatch) apples (nbrRej) were Rejected, this is (percRej)%
(percRej)% of the apples were rejected, this equals to (nbrRej) apples
